channel.title: raspberrypi on DOVH
channel.description: Recent content in raspberrypi on DOVH

item.title: Raspberry Pi 4 Kubernetes cluster
item.description: Installation Prepare the image for Raspberry Pi Download Pi imager Setup each nodes SD card k3s Install To install k3s on Raspberry pi-cluster i have used awesome opensource project k3s-ansible Follow the instructions on how to install k3s in the projects readme.
